HotelElement.Name: Hilton Grand Vacations at The Flamingo

Description.Text: Hilton Grand Vacations Suites at the Flamingo is ideal for the traveler who loves being on the Strip and appreciates the ability to retreat to the quiet comfort of luxury living. Studios one and two-bedroom suites afford business and leisure travelers an opportunity to relax overlooking rushing waterfalls lush tropical gardens and a magnificent swimming complex. With many different area activities to pursue you will have no problem keeping entertained. Famous area attractions include Hoover Dam Lake Mead Red Rock and the Grand Canyon as well as all the great shows and restaurants. We invite you to discover what the full service Concierge Staff can do to make your trip and every visit to Las Vegas an unforgettable experience. Features Exceptional non-gaming exclusive club setting One and two-bedroom suites include fully equipped kitchens with washer - dryer living and dining areas and luxurious master suites with whirlpool tubs Outdoor heated pools and whirlpool spa On-site deli restaurant and seasonal pool bar Exercise facilities and sauna Conference room for small groups and functions Full service Concierge for show tickets dining reservations and local tours.

Positioned on the most famous corner of the Las Vegas Strip along with Bally's Paris Caesars and the Bellagio located on the grounds of the Flamingo Hotel this property is a resort within a resort. Convenient to the I-15 Freeway and situated at a Las Vegas Monorail Station you*ll find easy access to nearby shopping which includes the world renowned Fashion Show Mall and the Las Vegas Premium Outlets. Just four miles from McCarran International Airport Las Vegas Executive Air Terminal and Signature Flight Support Hilton Grand Vacations Suites at the Flamingo is the perfect destination.

The 315 guestrooms at Hilton Grand Vacations Suites at the Flamingo include safes and coffee/tea makers. Rooms have city, mountain, or pool views. Televisions are equipped with cable channels and VCRs. Guests can use the in-room complimentary wireless high-speed Internet access. All units at this 3-star resort have kitchenettes with cookware/dishes/utensils and cooking facilities. Additional amenities include hair dryers and irons/ironing boards. In addition, housekeeping is offered daily and amenities available on request include wake-up calls.

Desert Garden Shop and Deli - Our quality retail grocery center supplies a wide range of beverages snacks and ready-to-cook items. The aroma of our deli will entice your appetite to select one of our breakfast lunch or dinner specials. Patio seating now open.. The desert garden sp. Seasonal Pool Bar - Open seasonally April - October hours vary.
